title: API-page about achievements misses a property

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: The coin rewards are a fairly new feature, probably why it’s not documented on the wiki yet. I don’t have edit rights on the wiki’s API namespace; I’ll look into getting that today.

comments.author: Nokomis.5076
comments.body:
Hi everyone,

https://wiki.guildwars2.com/wiki/API:2/achievements
there is a property missing. A very few achievements have Coins as a reward type. See https://api.guildwars2.com/v2/achievements/1840

I was unsure if I should just edit the wiki page.

PS: achievement 1840 is listed in the examples and is missing Coins as well in the rewards.
